title: Massive earthquakes provide new insight into deep Earth

title_detail.value: Massive earthquakes provide new insight into deep Earth

summary: In a first-ever study of two of the largest deep earthquakes ever recorded in human history, researchers reveal new and surprising information about our planet's mysterious, ever-changing interior.

summary_detail.value: In a first-ever study of two of the largest deep earthquakes ever recorded in human history, researchers reveal new and surprising information about our planet's mysterious, ever-changing interior.
